course.name: Introduction to Random Stuff
course.description: Introduction to doing random stuff, it's so much fun being random..

entries.title: Video: Embracing Randomness
entries.description: A video discussing the beauty and application of randomness in everyday life.

entries.title: Important Alert
entries.content: Please complete the introductory survey on random topics by Friday.

entries.title: Video: The Chaos Theory Explained
entries.description: An engaging explanation of chaos theory and its applications.

entries.title: Assignment: Chaos in Everyday Life
entries.description: Write a short essay on how randomness influences your daily decisions.

entries.description: Learn how random number generators are used in computer science and beyond.

entries.content: Next lecture will feature a guest speaker discussing randomness in art.
